articles.title: Tech News | Apple Imagines Mac-Inside-a-Keyboard Device - LatestLY
articles.description: Get latest articles and stories on Tech at LatestLY. American tech giant Apple is exploring the possibility of integrating a fully functioning Mac within a keyboard, reminiscent of home computers of the 80s, such as the Commodore 64 and Sinclair ZX Spectrum.

articles.author: Timothy Bella
articles.title: How George Zimmerman stretched 15 minutes of infamy into a decade of disgust - The Washington Post
articles.description: Since the former neighborhood watch volunteer who killed Trayvon Martin was acquitted of murder, Zimmerman, once described by GQ as “the most hated free man in America,” has stayed in the news thanks to 10 years of reprehensible headlines.
